title: How Bobby Berk Found His Happy Place
description:
Interior designer and “Queer Eye” star Bobby Berk has spent years helping others discover the joy in their living spaces. How he found it for himself was simple: By being true to who he is. 

Follow Bobby on Instagram, Twitter and Facebook

Visit Bobby’s website: bobbyberk.com

Photo by Luke Fontana, courtesy of Bobby Berk

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
